participant_1.background:
I don't play any sports, but I enjoy hiking and biking on my days off.
my favorite color is orange.
my college courses are on philosophy and history.
I am a good listener and always there for my friends and family.
i work as an extra for major motion pictures.

participant_2.background:
I love nature documentaries because they make me feel like I'm exploring the wilderness without leaving my couch.
i am not very good at playing basketball.
My family is supportive of my musical dreams, and we often go to the opera together.
My favorite music is techno, it helps me get in the zone for my workouts.
i eat tuna fish salad at least every day.

content.text: Hi! I'm an extra for major motion pictures. What do you do for a living?
Hi! I'm a music student, and I also work as a server.
Oh that's awesome! What kind of music do you study?
I study classical music, but I also play in a rock band.
That's really cool! I wish I could play an instrument.
It's never too late to learn!
I know, but I'm not very good at it.
Well, even if you're not good at it, it's still a fun hobby!
Yeah, you're right.
So what do you like to do for fun?
I like to hike and bike. I also like to read.
That sounds really relaxing.
It is. I love being outdoors.
Me too! I love nature documentaries. They make me feel like I'm exploring the wilderness without leaving my couch.
That's a good way to put it.
So what's your favorite color?
Orange. It's a happy color.
I like orange too! It's a good color for spring.
Yeah, it is. It makes me think of sunshine.
Me too
